page.title: 20EDITOR'S ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
I would like to thank everyone who was involved in the making of this Domesday disk. Many people gave of their time and energy especially the general public who were on the whole very cooperative. I would like to give special mention to the staff and pupils of the participating schools. These were:
{Anson J.M.& I. }-Mr.N.Habibis {Gladstone Park J.M. }-Mr.J.O'Neill {Northview J.M.& I. }-Mr.A.Wickham {St.Mary Magdalen's R.C.}-Mr.G.Farrell {Willesden High School }-Mr.R.Parry
I owe special thanks to{Mr.M.Molloy}of St.Mary Magdalen's for much help with the selection of materials.
{AREA CO-ORDINATOR GERARD FARRELL
